messages.subject: About Japanese Auctions
messages.msgSnippet: I appreciate your feed-backs very much! To stay in business, we have to charge these service fees. They are relatively low when comparing to the other bidding
messages.messageBody:
I appreciate your feed-backs very much!

To stay in business, we have to charge these service fees.
They are relatively low when comparing to the other bidding services.
(the most common pricing is US$1/1000yen which means 11,7%)

Thank you
Nichido66 from,
www.japanauctioncenter.com <http://www.japanauctioncenter.com>





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
